D: This spell will cause the enemy to burn. ( Lvl: 1, Typ: Fire, Eng: 2, Dmg: 1 )
This spell will burn the enemy a lot. ( Lvl: 5, Typ: Fire, Eng: 5, Dmg: 6 )

This spell will barrage the enemy with grass. ( Lvl: 7, Typ: Grass, Eng: 10, Dmg: 9 )
This spell will slice the enemy with thin grass. ( Lvl: 15, Typ: Grass, Eng: 23, Dmg: 18 )
This spell will violently cut your foe with large blades of grass. ( Lvl: 24, Typ: Grass, Eng: 33, Dmg: 28 )
This fully enhanced spell will cut through the limbs of your opponent with sharp grass. ( Lvl: 33, Typ: Grass, Eng: 50, Dmg: 50 )

This spell will hurtle sharp rocks at your enemy.  ( Lvl: 11, Typ: Earth, Eng: 15, Dmg: 12 )
This spell will hurtle sharp magma rocks at your enemy.  ( Lvl: 20, Typ: Earth, Eng: 28, Dmg: 24 )
This fully enhanced spell will launch rocks of massive size at your enemy with scary speeds.  ( Lvl: 30, Typ: Earth, Eng: 41, Dmg: 39 )
This spell will blast your enemy with wind.  ( Lvl: 6, Typ: Wind, Eng: 7, Dmg: 7 )
This spell will blast your enemy with violent wind.  ( Lvl: 15, Typ: Wind, Eng: 19, Dmg: 16 )
This spell will barrage your enemy with extreamly violent wind.  ( Lvl: 24, Typ: Wind, Eng: 28, Dmg: 25 )
This fully enhanced spell will shoot winds fast enough to slice through your enemy.  ( Lvl: 36, Typ: Wind, Eng: 28, Dmg: 46 )
This spell will heal you.  ( Lvl: 5, Typ: Normal, Eng: 7, Heal: 5 - 25 )
healFunction: function ( )  {  var gainedAmount = 5 + random ( 21 );  if(health + gainedAmount > maxHealth)  gainedAmount = maxHealth - health;  boostStat("health", gainedAmount, "You heal "+gainedAmount+" health.");  if ( inBattle )   splash ( field.pro._x, field.pro._y - ( field.pro._height / 2 ), "hp", "none", "none", gainedAmount.toString ( ) );  playSound ( "SFX_Heal", 0, 1 );  return;  }

D: This spell will heal you well.  ( Lvl: 15, Typ: Normal, Eng: 20, Heal: 15 - 100 )
healFunction: function ( )  {  var gainedAmount = 15 + random ( 86 );  if(health + gainedAmount > maxHealth)  gainedAmount = maxHealth - health;  boostStat("health", gainedAmount, "You heal "+gainedAmount+" health.");  if ( inBattle )   splash ( field.pro._x, field.pro._y - ( field.pro._height / 2 ), "hp", "none", "none", gainedAmount.toString ( ) );  playSound ( "SFX_Heal", 0, 1 );  return;  }

healFunction: function ( )  {  var gainedAmount = 125 + random ( 301 );  if(health + gainedAmount > maxHealth)  gainedAmount = maxHealth - health;  boostStat("health", gainedAmount, "You heal "+gainedAmount+" health.");  if ( inBattle )   splash ( field.pro._x, field.pro._y - ( field.pro._height / 2 ), "hp", "none", "none", gainedAmount.toString ( ) );  playSound ( "SFX_Heal", 0, 1 );  return;  }
